title: Bug 102623 - Image not refreshing after reimporting
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not refreshing and the original image is still displayed.
OB: When importing a new image into the layout again, the original image is still displayed.
EB: After importing a new image into the layout again, the new image should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Import a new image, 'image1.jpg', into the layout.
2. Verify that the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
